description: This course will introduce you to this important concept and show you how to deliver your marketing campaigns more effectively, on time and within budget. In addition to project planning, management and evaluation, the course will introduce you to risk management and mitigation, market research, using and presenting data, and producing business cases for marketing proposals. It also contains specific advice for CIM students undertaking the Project management in Marketing Unit, which will help you complete the assignment for the subject.
title: Project Management in Marketing: Enhance Marketing Career
